data.name: Music Maker Steam Edition
data.detailed_description:
Featured DLC

https://store.steampowered.com/app/972260/Music_Maker_2019_Premium_Steam_Edition/


About the Software

For more music.

Music Maker Steam Edition is free – and yet still a true full version: 8 tracks, over 400 free sounds as well as additional free Soundpools and software instruments. Music Maker contains a whole range of options to make music production as simple as possible.
Even if you're a beginner, right from the start you can use Drag & Drop controls and included loops to make hip-hop, trap and techno beats With the included Loops your music will not only sound authentic and harmonic, but also highly professional. Easily compose your own melodies and chords with the MIDI editor – you don't even need to be able to read music.

The Music Maker principle. The choice is yours.

Music Maker Steam Edition gives you the room you need to bring your ideas to life. And now you can even customize Music Maker to fit your personal style.
Simply open the Store directly in the program and discover the latest sounds from popular genres, download new software instruments or expand your Music Maker with helpful features, like the new multi-core support or infinite tracks.

Music Maker – Steam Edition:

  • is free!
  • is easy to use: Simply Drag & Drop
  • sounds amazing: Thanks to the audio engine from our professional DAW Samplitude
  • can be expanded anytime: Thousands of new sounds, features and instruments – directly in the In-App Store
  • is always up-to-date: Free updates – for as long as we develop the software.

data.short_description: The original for making music: The Music Maker. Now free.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Dutch, Finnish, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Swedish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 | 8 | 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard, minimum resolution 1280 x 768
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • Additional Notes: Hard drive space: 700 MB or more for program installation
